name: 徐正會
objective: Type synthesis and number synthesis of mechanisms, Creative mechanism synthesis, Dimensional synthesis of motion, path, function generators, Introduction of spherical mechanisms and spatial mechanisms.
schedule:
1. Introduction to Mechanisms
2. Design Process and Creative Design
3. Mechanical Members and Joints
4. Engineering Creativity and its Characteristics
5. Atlas of Kinematic Chains
6. Kinematic Matrices
7. Specializing Algorithm and Specialized Chains
8. Generalizing Principles and Rules
9. Mid-term Exam
10. Case Study: Motor cross Suspension Mechanisms
11. Linkage Transformation and Types of Motion
12. Synthesis of Function Generators (Graphical Methods)
13. Synthesis of Path Generators (Graphical Methods)
14. Synthesis of Motion Generators (Graphical Methods)
15. Geneva Mechanisms and Straight-line Mechanisms
16. Case Study: Clamping Devices
17. Spherical Mechanisms and Spatial Mechanisms
18. Final Exam
materials:
“Kinematics and Dynamics of Machinery” by Norton (東華，新月); 
“Kinematics, Dynamics, and Design of Machinery” by Waldron (歐亞)
